XXL.Chess.interfaces

Interface TileInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Tile

    public interface TileInterface
    Interface for managing properties of a tile in a chess game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getCellSize()
      Gets the size of the tile cell.
      int[] getTileColor()
      Gets the color of the tile.
      void setCellSize(int cellSize)
      Sets the size of the tile cell.
      void setTileColor(int[] tileColor)
      Sets the color of the tile.

    • Method Detail

      • getCellSize

        int getCellSize()
        Gets the size of the tile cell.
        Returns:
        The size of the tile cell

      • setCellSize

        void setCellSize(int cellSize)
        Sets the size of the tile cell.
        Parameters:
        cellSize - The size of the tile cell to set

      • getTileColor

        int[] getTileColor()
        Gets the color of the tile.
        Returns:
        An array representing the RGB color of the tile

      • setTileColor

        void setTileColor(int[] tileColor)
        Sets the color of the tile.
        Parameters:
        tileColor - An array representing the RGB color to set for the tile
